securityTitle.value: Common stock, par value $0.00001 per share

footnotes.footnote: This transaction represents the withholding by Enova International, Inc. ("Issuer") of Issuer's shares to pay taxes in connection with the vesting of restricted stock on November 14, 2018. The timing and amount of the ransaction were determined by the terms of the applicable restricted stock and were not within the control of Mr. Zeeman.

Includes a grant of RSUs that have vested or shall vest in substantially equal one-fourth increments on each of the following dates as long as grantee serves as an employee of Issuer or an affiliate thereof through the applicable vesting date: November 14, 2016, November 14, 2017, November 14, 2018 and November 14, 2019.

Includes a grant of RSUs that have vested or shall vest in substantially equal one-third increments on each of the following dates as long as grantee serves as an employee of Issuer or an affiliate thereof through the applicable vesting date: February 23, 2017, February 23, 2018 and February 23, 2019.

Includes a grant of RSUs that have vested or shall vest in substantially equal one-fourth increments on each of the following dats as long as grantee serves as an employee of Issuer or an affiliate through the applibable vesting date: February 17, 2018, February 17, 2019, February 17, 2020 and February 17, 2021.

Includes a grant of RSUs that shall vest in substantially equal one-fourth increments on each of the following dates as long as grantee serves as an employee of Issuer or an affiliate thereof through the applicable vesting date: February 13, 2019, February 13, 2020, February 13, 2021 and February 13, 2022.
